specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to their shooting rolls.
specialRules.name: Augment
specialRules.label: Augment
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to their shooting rolls.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one enemy unit to attack and select a bomb type below.
specialRules.name: Bomb Racks
specialRules.label: Bomb Racks
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one enemy unit to attack and select a bomb type below.

specialRules.name: Then roll 1 die and on a 2+ it takes hits as described
specialRules.label: Then roll 1 die and on a 2+ it takes hits as described

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of the following codes, and they get one of these rules until the end of the round: • Lead by Example: Fear.
specialRules.name: Follow the Code
specialRules.label: Follow the Code
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of the following codes, and they get one of these rules until the end of the round: • Lead by Example: Fear.

specialRules.hint: If this unit manages to hit its target it may move up to 6” directly toward it, if physically possible.
specialRules.name: Grappling Hook
specialRules.label: Grappling Hook
specialRules.description: If this unit manages to hit its target it may move up to 6” directly toward it, if physically possible.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: This unit may block spells as if it had the Wizard(2) special rule.
specialRules.name: Storm Sight
specialRules.label: Storm Sight
specialRules.description: This unit may block spells as if it had the Wizard(2) special rule.

specialRules.hint: This model may transport up to X models. Units embark by moving into contact and may use any action to disembark but only move by 6”. Units may also be deployed within a transport. If a unit is inside a transport when it’s destroyed then it must take a Dangerous Terrain test, is immediately Wavering, and surviving models must be placed within 6” of the transport before it’s removed from play.
specialRules.name: Transport(X)
specialRules.label: Transport(X)
specialRules.description: This model may transport up to X models. Units embark by moving into contact and may use any action to disembark but only move by 6”. Units may also be deployed within a transport. If a unit is inside a transport when it’s destroyed then it must take a Dangerous Terrain test, is immediately Wavering, and surviving models must be placed within 6” of the transport before it’s removed from play.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated, if it is inside or within 2” of a Sky-Gunboat, Sky-Frigate or Sky-Ironclad, the ship may immediately move up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Wind-Reader
specialRules.label: Wind-Reader
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated, if it is inside or within 2” of a Sky-Gunboat, Sky-Frigate or Sky-Ironclad, the ship may immediately move up to 6”.

spells.name: Wind Rune
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +3” next time it moves.

spells.name: Aether Shock
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Tinker
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may heal 1 wound or restore 1 model (with only 1 health left if it had Tough).

spells.name: Sledge Shock
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 3 hits with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Sky-Sight
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Sky Shock
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 8 automatic hits.
